title: So I thought of a Kindred build...

replies.body:
Personally I like to go {{item:1419}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3085}} {{item:3022}} and then either {{item:3036}} {{item:3033}} {{item:3812}} .

3x Attack speed Quints
9x Attack speed Marks
7x MR Glyphs
2x Attack Speed Glyphs (can change these for MR)
9x Flat Armour Seals

Early game is slow and a bit squishy but once you build the first 3 items you can chew down enemies with the amount of attack speed due to BR passive dealing 4% of the targets maximum health and BOTRK dealing 8% of the targets current health. Especially when you throw in mounting dread which deals a flat amount +5% of targets maximum health also you are essentially dealing over 1/4 of the targets health no matter who they are within the first 3 AA's and due to the Attack speed sitting at around 2.05 after runaans hurricane it chews through them so ridiculously fast. I can peel down high HP opponents and Carry's in seconds. Played kindred ARAM with this build using deaths dance and had a full health gragas at our nexus towers, I chewed him down and killed him in under 2 seconds solo. 
Add in deaths dance for more sustain and more damage or either Lord Doms or Mortal reminder for even more chew down if they have some annoying tanks like a fed nasus.

high aoe clear, high aoe damage, relatively tanky, high ad, high attack speed, decent crit rate. 

Don't build the (would be core item) dev, because rito decided to nerf it to hell for ranged champs (I suspect just because they hated me pwnging people with jg tf) so its near useless, warrior is a much better alternative on kindred atm in jg.

Kindred does have a problem with early clear being pretty slow due to high cd and low damage, so starting w will really increase output and give sustain, although kindred is really easy to counter jg early, and easy to burst early in the jg as well due to lack of escape or burst. She actually does excel in adc role, she has easy sustain (is she does it mobile (constantly moving between attacks(like yasuo should do to charge his passive))) q mobility to dodge skillshots like hooks, a slow (which benefits in lane more to be maxed b4 q due to slow and burst) and an ult that saves her and her allies (not enemies) is positioned properly.

Also, just mark enemy kindred if they do jg for easy stacks, a jg kindred has a very very slow power spike compered to adc kindred

Don't devourer it's bad, I don't find mallet that good on her, pretty much rush warrior Bork and triforce and you should be good, depending on how your going will depend on what you build next but movespeed and lifesteal are best suited to kindred
